question: Which of the following right is available to both foreigners and Indians?
option1: Right against discrimination on grounds of religion, race, caste ,sex or place of birth
option2: Right to equality of opportunity in matter of public employment
option3: Protection of life and personal property
option4: Protection of language , script and cluster of minorities
answer: Protection of life and personal property
explanation: Not all the Fundamental Rights are available to foreigners in India. Right to life and personal property covered in Article 21 of the Constitution of India is available both to foreigners and Indians.
